MapConditionDef.label: Unusual cold
MapConditionDef.description: An unusual cold snap is freezing the region.

MapConditionDef.label: Darkness
MapConditionDef.description: An unusual dark and cold... night.

MapConditionDef.label: Nuclear fallout
MapConditionDef.description: You colony has been struck by a low-yield nuclear weapon, in addition to the explosion, it has lofted a plume of radioactive particles into the lower atmosphere, blocking sunlight and irradiating the area. Temperatures will be lowered and exposed people and animals will take radiation damage.
MapConditionDef.endMessage: Congratulations! Radiation soon goes to natural normal level. If you have received this message, probably you are one of the best Rimworld players!

MapConditionDef.label: Radiation effect
MapConditionDef.description: Too much radiation from the solar flare has triggered cosmic radiation.
MapConditionDef.endMessage: It seems radiation effect soon goes to normal level.

MapConditionDef.label: bombardment
MapConditionDef.description: Faction are not pleased with you.. so they bomb you to hell.
